Hi,
Does anyone have experience of developing JUnit tests for Eclipse based User
Interface?
The product being an Eclipse plugin.

The Interface/plugin is developed using:
org.eclipse.ui
org.eclipse.swt
org.eclipse.jface
org.eclipse.core.resources
org.eclipse.ui.workbench
org.eclipse.ui.navigator
org.eclipse.ui.ide

Thanks,
-Kamal.
subject: Junit used for Eclipse UI based Interface
